FirebaseRTDB setReview should return a review key on success
FirebaseRTDB setReview should throw a CustomError on failure
FirebaseRTDB getReviews should return all reviews for a movie
FirebaseRTDB getReviews should throw a CustomError if spectators reviews fetch fails
FirebaseRTDB removeReview should delete a review
FirebaseRTDB removeReview should throw a CustomError on failure
FirebaseRTDB deleteUserReviews should delete user reviews from both critic and spectator categories
FirebaseRTDB getVerificationRequests should return all verification requests
FirebaseRTDB getVerificationRequests should throw a CustomError if no requests are found
FirebaseRTDB setVerificationRequest should return a request key on success
FirebaseRTDB setVerificationRequest should throw a CustomError on failure
FirebaseRTDB updateRequestStatus should update the request status
FirebaseRTDB updateRequestStatus should throw a CustomError if the request is not found
FirebaseRTDB moveReviews should move user reviews from one path to another
FirebaseRTDB moveReviews should throw a CustomError if the move fails
CustomError should create an instance of CustomError with a message and original error
CustomError should create an instance of CustomError with only a message
CustomError should capture the stack trace
Actor Model should create an actor with correct properties
ActorProfile Model should create an actor profile with correct properties
genderToString Function should return correct string for gender 0
genderToString Function should return correct string for gender 1
genderToString Function should return correct string for gender 2
genderToString Function should return correct string for gender 3
genderToString Function should return empty string for unknown gender
FirebaseAuth createUser should return a user record on success
FirebaseAuth createUser should throw a CustomError on failure
FirebaseAuth verifyIdToken should return a decoded token on success
FirebaseAuth verifyIdToken should throw a CustomError on failure
FirebaseAuth updateUser should update a user on success
FirebaseAuth updateUser should throw a CustomError on failure
FirebaseAuth changeUserRole should update the user role on success
FirebaseAuth changeUserRole should throw a CustomError on failure
FirebaseAuth deleteUser should delete a user on success
FirebaseAuth deleteUser should throw a CustomError on failure
VerificationRequest Model should create a verification request with all properties
VerificationRequest Model should create a verification request without optional properties
UserFirebaseAuth Model should create a user with correct properties
isValidEmail Function should return true for a valid email
isValidEmail Function should return false for an email without @ symbol
isValidEmail Function should return false for an email without domain
isValidEmail Function should return false for an email without top-level domain
isValidEmail Function should return false for an email with spaces
isValidEmail Function should return false for an empty string
CarouselMovie Model should create a carousel movie with correct properties
Genre Model should create a genre with correct properties
Movie Model should create a movie with correct properties
MoviePoster Model should create a movie poster with correct properties
Review Model should create a review with correct properties
